article_title: The Morning Download: ​Cloud, Once an Adjunct to Data Center, Now Drives Corporate IT
article_text:
Reuters

Cloud gains reported by Amazon.com and Microsoft on Thursday reflects changing corporate IT priorities. Data centers, on a purely quantitative basis, still store most of the typical company’s data and run most of its computing. But the sense of inhibition and restraint that characterized the way big companies use the cloud has been lifted.
